resources.string: Write here your words or press the Insert button to load them from a text file.

Button ADD: load the words from the the editor text box, parses the inserted text and adds the words to the wordlist. \n(Note: only the words with 3 or more characters are accepted and every character that is not a letter is considered as a space)
Button DELETE: cleans up the editor text box.
Button OPEN: opens a dialog box for choosing the file from where loading the words. \n(Note: only txt file are eligible)
Button SAVE: opens a dialog for saving the text in editor text box into a file stored on the SD card.
Button DESELECT ALL: deselects all the check boxes of the word list.
Button SELECT ALL: selects all the check boxes of the word list.
Button RELOAD: resets the grid and changes the positions of the words.

The led is green if all the words that you have chose are inside the grid, is red otherwise. \nIf the led is green all the words that you have chose have been fitted into the grid, if it is red maybe you chose too many words and there is not enough space on the grid. Try to reload the grid by clicking the RELOAD button or returns back to the first screen to deselect some words. \n(Note that words with more than 14 character cannot be displayed)
